function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Presence of viral particles in bathroom surfaces and aerosols","Impact":"Potential transmission of the virus through bathroom surfaces and aerosols","Mitigation":"Regular and thorough cleaning and disinfection of bathroom surfaces, improving ventilation in the bathroom to reduce aerosol concentration","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI) systems, antimicrobial surface coatings","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Facility management, infection control team"},{"Description":"Contamination of hands during toilet usage","Impact":"Potential transmission of the virus to other surfaces and individuals","Mitigation":"Promoting and ensuring proper hand hygiene after toilet usage, providing hand sanitation stations near bathrooms","Technologies":"Touchless faucets, automatic soap dispensers, alcohol-based hand sanitizers","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Facility management, infection control team"},{"Description":"Generation of bio-aerosols in drainage stacks after toilet flushing","Impact":"Potential spread of bio-aerosols to other areas of the facility","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation and air circulation in drainage stacks, regular maintenance and cleaning of drainage system","Technologies":"Air purification systems, exhaust fans, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI) systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Facility management, maintenance team"}]}
